root: ^Steadville. You’ve spent your whole life in this town, nested in the flank of a mountain. Overlooking a fertile valley, it’s a reasonably wealthy town, made all the more interesting by the constant traffic of adventurers, vagrants, travelers and even tourists. That traffic is made all the more frequent by the location of the town: right at the border between your own kingdom, Valguard, and the neighboring one, Leirrus.

^The previous winter, now infamously known as the ‘Dead Sun’, was particularly harsh, but you helped Steadville pull through, and it made you popular enough to be appointed mayor of the town. You are now officially responsible for the town’s wellbeing, but another crisis looms on the horizon.

^The famine caused by the Dead Sun has severely degraded the relations between Valguard and Leirrus, and it is now a well known fact that in four weeks, Leirrus is going to attack Valguard. It normally wouldn’t concern you, but they’re going to have to go through you, one way or another. Do you want to ask for help from the government of Valguard?

Beginning2: ^Fate has this funny way of doing what it likes, regardless of your wishes or opinions. It would be suicide for Valguard’s army to defend Steadville. So they have sent you a letter that meant, in a stately indirect way: ‘You’re on your own, good luck’.
^It is your responsibility to protect Steadville and its inhabitants. Gather resources, prepare your town, and prepare yourself, all while … because mayor: war is coming.
